original_text: And Jacob rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his loins, and mourned for his son many days.
korean_text: 자기 옷을 찢고 굵은 베로 허리를 묶고 오래도록 그의 아들을 위하여 애통하니

sentences.original_text: and put sackcloth upon his loins
and mourned for his son many days
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 날 동안 그 아들을 위해 슬퍼했다
